name: SpaceX Launch Tracker
description: An app designed to follow SpaceX launches created with React, GraphQL & Apollo.

name: MERN Shopping List
description: A dynamic app built with the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node) stack which enable users to sign in, create and edit a shopping list.

name: Quali-Fi
description: A job posting site created with Angular and Ruby on Rails.

name: Charity Finder
description: A website designed to aid in locating charities based on user input built using React and Ruby on Rails.

name: Budgit
description: An application to track monthly expenditures built with Ruby on Rails.

name: Simon game
description: A simple game based on Simon built utilizing JavaScript and jQuery.
